document_data.mainbody:
Aruns Alley was a small road located in the city of Waterdeep.
Aruns Alley was found in southern Waterdeep within the Dock Ward. It branched east off of Wards Way before terminating at a dead end. The alley ran parallel to Lackpurse Lane to the north and Belnimbras Street to the south.
Aruns Alley was wide, making it usable by carters accessing nearby warehouses and businesses. Private guards hired by the businesses located on the alley and the Carters and Coachmen Guild ensured this small road was kept safe.
